name: Warframe Equinox Prime Access: Metamorphosis Pack
detailed_description:
Get Equinox Prime Access now and instantly add the latest Prime Weapons (Stradavar Prime and Tipedo Prime) to your Arsenal!

For more Prime Access Bundle options, click here.

METAMORPHOSIS PACK
1050 Platinum
Stradavar Prime
Tipedo Prime

Equinox Prime, Stradavar Prime and Tipedo Prime can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.
about_the_game:
Get Equinox Prime Access now and instantly add the latest Prime Weapons (Stradavar Prime and Tipedo Prime) to your Arsenal!

METAMORPHOSIS PACK

short_description: Make the newest Prime Weapons yours instantly. Metamorphosis Pack includes 1050 Platinum, Stradavar Prime and Tipedo Prime.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 10+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

legal_notice: Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd.
